artefact.overview: You can track your passport application by asking for an email update from the Identity and Passport Service.
artefact.more_information:
##Your details

To use this service you must have:

- a UK address 
- a current UK passport application (made in the UK using your address)

^You'll be asked for your application number - this is the 10-digit barcode number on your application form (or on your receipt if you used Check & Send).^
artefact.introduction:
You can fill in an online form to ask for an update on your passport application. You'll get an email back within 1 day.

You should allow 3 weeks after you submit your application before you use this service.
